cuisine.title: Our Cuisine
cuisine.subtitle: Simple, generous, and authentic cuisine, prepared with fresh seasonal ingredients and served with a smile, from our kitchen to your table.

restaurant.title: The Restaurant
restaurant.subtitle: Take a seat on the terrace, the beach, or in the garden; let yourself be captivated by the view of Lake Itasy and savor the moment by the pool.

massage.title: A Moment of Relaxation
massage.subtitle: Surrender to the expert hands of our masseuse for an interlude of relaxation and serenity.

location.text_2: In the heart of the Itasy region

presentation-card.title: Serenity 120km from Antananarivo
presentation-card.p1: Discover your haven of tranquility in the heart of Ampefy.
presentation-card.p2: Our hotel invites you to a stay combining relaxation, nature, and authenticity.
presentation-card.p3: Enjoy a peaceful setting facing Lake Itasy for a moment of well-being.

description.p1: Ideal for solo travelers or couples, our three double bungalows feature a Queen-size bed, a bathroom, and a private terrace.
description.p2: Amenities include ventilation, television, and WIFI connection.
description.p3: Enjoy a direct view of Lake Itasy from your bungalow.

details.price: Rate excluding breakfast: 400,000 Ariary per night

section1.p1: This 80 m² suite is ideal for a couple, a group of friends, or a family of up to 5 people.
section1.p2: It consists of two connecting rooms.
section1.p3: The main bedroom is equipped with a Queen-size bed and has its own private bathroom.
section1.p4: The second room is modular, featuring three single beds or one double bed and one single bed, and also includes a bathroom.
section1.p5: Amenities include ventilation, a television, and WIFI connection.

section2.p1: The suite features a private terrace overlooking the lake, a private pool, and a jacuzzi*, for privileged moments of relaxation.

details.price: Rate excluding breakfast: 750,000 Ariary per night
details.addText: *For energy reasons, the jacuzzi can be used for 30 minutes per day between 8:00 AM and 7:00 PM.

description.p1: Ideal for a group of friends or a family, our four family bungalows feature two large Queen-size beds and a small bed, a bathroom, and a small terrace.
description.p2: Amenities include ventilation, television, and WIFI connection.

details.price: Rate excluding breakfast: 425,000 Ariary per night

section1.p1: The spacious 200 m² Villa offers a breathtaking view of Lake Itasy from its two balconies.
section1.p2: It is ideal for large families and can accommodate up to 10 people.
section1.p3: On the ground floor, it features two bedrooms: one double and one triple. Two bathrooms, one of which is equipped with a large bathtub and a walk-in shower.
section1.p4: A comfortable lounge area completes this space.

section2.p1: Upstairs, two connecting rooms are arranged: a triple room and a double room, with two bathrooms, one of which also includes a bathtub.
section2.p2: Amenities include ventilation, television, and WIFI connection.

section3.p1: The villa also benefits from a large shaded terrace overlooking the pool and jacuzzi, perfect for moments of relaxation in complete serenity.

details.price: Rate excluding breakfast: 1,750,000 Ariary per night

section1.p1: With an area of 100 m², the Duplexes can accommodate up to 6 people.
section1.p2: Two ground floor configurations are available: one with a separate bedroom, the other with an open space.
section1.p3: On the ground floor, a fully equipped bathroom with a walk-in shower.
section1.p4: Amenities include ventilation, television, and WIFI connection.

section2.p1: Upstairs, a large bedroom with a double bed and a small lounge area.
section2.p2: From the balcony, the view overlooks Lake Itasy.

section3.p1: In the upstairs bathroom, an elegant freestanding bathtub offers a breathtaking view of the lake, inviting relaxation.
section3.p2: Each duplex also features a private pool and terrace, for a stay dedicated to comfort and privacy.

details.price: Rate excluding breakfast: 800,000 Ariary per night
